entry.title: 魔绫像素地牢-0.6.1.0-Beta7.3
entry.summary:
魔绫像素地牢-Beta7.3-520特别版本： 新内容： 1.DM720进行了大改，且在新版本是在常规刷怪以20%概率出现 2.第八个精英强敌--苦痛精英----强势登场
Bug修复： 1.修复第三大层默认寒冰魔女的问题 2.修复诅咒法杖在BossRush的少量错误 3.修复闪电饭团一次性消耗两个的问题 4.修复DM720战斗结束电击效果可能存在的问题 5.修复恐药异症的各种问题 6.修复经验可能为负的问题，如果为负，下次行动立刻矫正
-常见问题： 如果快捷栏显示错误，请到游戏设置调整显示比列

Magic Ling Pixel Dungeon - Beta7.2: New content: 1. DM720 has undergone major changes, and in the new version, it appears with a 20% probability of regular monster brushing 2. The 8th Elite Strong Enemy - Painful Elite - Strongly Appearing
Bug fix: 1. Fix the issue of default Ice Demon on the third layer 2. Fixed a few errors with the Curse Staff in BossRush 3. Fix the problem of two lightning Rice and vegetable roll consumed at one time 4. Fix possible issues with the electric shock effect at the end of the DM720 battle 5. Fix various issues related to drug phobia 6. If the repair experience may be negative, take immediate corrective action next time -Frequently asked questions: If the shortcut bar displays an error, please go to the game settings to adjust the display ratio
